name: The Tough Life of a Rare Slime
name_original: The Tough Life of a Rare Slime
description:
You are one of the few suvivors of your home planet. Your slimey species is being exploited because of your Essence, wanted because of its usefulness in many different areas. Now not many survive, and you have to do your best to keep yourself alive, and not lose all of your Essence, for you, for your species. Good Luck!

Controls:

  • Move: A-D or arrow keys
  • Dash: Space
  • Pause: Esc

Credits:

  • Made by Shlomito
  • Following Blackthornprod's Beginner Course
  • Music:
    • Space Game Theme Loop 2 by Mrthenoronha
    • Arcade Music Loop by joshuaempyre
